trans-unit.source: Represents the `<saml:Advice>` element within a SAML assertion that contains additional information provided by the SAML authority.
The `<saml:Advice>` element within a SAML assertion is an extension point for SAML tokens.
One example of how to use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice> class is to provide supporting information about the SAML authority issuing the SAML assertion.

This supporting information can be in the form of a SAML assertion or a reference to a SAML assertion, which are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> properties, respectively.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice"></xref> class.

When this constructor is called and the instance is not modified prior to serializing it into XML by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> method, an empty `<saml:Advice>` element is generated by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> method.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice"></xref> class using the specified collection of SAML assertions.
The elements of the `assertions` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> property.

An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains SAML assertions that provides additional information for a SAML assertion.
assertions contains a `null` element.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice"></xref> class.
The elements of the `references` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property.

An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.
references contains a `null` element.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice"></xref> class using the specified collections of SAML assertions and SAML assertion references.
The elements of the `references` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property.
The elements of the `assertions` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> property.

An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.

An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains SAML assertions that provide additional information for a SAML assertion.
references contains a `null` element.
-or-
assertions contains a `null` element.
Gets a collection of references to SAML assertions.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property corresponds to the `<saml:AssertionIDReference>` child element of the `<saml:Advice>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.

When the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> property is `true`, the collection that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property is read-only.

An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IList`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.
Gets a collection of SAML assertions.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property corresponds to the `<saml:Assertion>` child element of the `<saml:Advice>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.

When the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> property is `true`, the collection that is returned from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> property is read-only.

An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IList`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains SAML assertions that provides additional information for a SAML assertion.
Gets a value indicating whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
`true` if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Causes this instance to be read-only.
When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.MakeReadOnly%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`.
Reads the `<saml:Advice>` XML element using the specified XML reader.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader"></xref> to read the `<saml:Advice>` XML element.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML assertion that are defined in the SAML specification.

A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature for SAML assertions that contain this `<saml:Advice>` XML element.
reader is `null`
-or-
samlSerializer is `null`
The `<saml:Advice>` element does not conform to the XML schema for the `<saml:Advice>` element.
Writes this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice"></xref> into the specified XML writer as an `<saml:Advice>` element.
A <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter"></xref> to write the `<saml:Advice>` element.

A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing the `<saml:Advice>` element and its child elements and attributes that are defined in the SAML specification.
writer is `null`
-or-
samlSerializer is `null`
